summary: Rayne, the half-human/half-vampire warrior, ventures to America's 1880's Wild West to stop the vampired Billy the Kid and his posse of vampire cowboys.
cast: Natassia Malthe|Zack Ward|Michael Paré|Chris Coppola|Chris Spencer|Brendan Fletcher|Sarah-Jane Redmond|Michael Teigen|Michael Eklund|John Novak|Tyron Leitso|Jodelle Ferland|Mike Dopud|Vincent Gale|John Tench|Michael Robinson|Taya Calicetto|Arash Virani|Carrie Genzel|Jamie Switch|Steffen Mennekes|Alana Drozduke|Cole Heppell|Aidan Williamson|Doris Blomgren|Chris Banks|Tasha Lee Moth|Hawk Younkins
keywords: 19th century|returning character with different actor|vampire|leather pants|historic figures as characters
title: BloodRayne II: Deliverance
